titlestmt.titleproper: John D. Rockefeller, Sr. family photographs, Series 1003
A Guide to the John D. Rockefeller, Sr. family photographs, Series 1003 FA447

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-10-04 02:16:28 -0400.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller, Sr. family photographs, Series 1003

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p:
Rockefeller family photographic holdings are arranged into the following series:
Rockefeller family and Avery family photographs, Series 1001. William Avery Rockefeller family photographs, Series 1002. John D. Rockefeller family photographs, Series 1003. William Rockefeller family photographs, Series 1004. John D. Rockefeller Jr. family photographs, Series 1005. Pocantico Hills photographs, Series 1006. John D. Rockefeller 3rd family photographs, Series 1007. Nelson A. Rockefeller family photographs, Series 1008. Laurance S. Rockefeller family photographs, Series 1009. David Rockefeller family photographs, Series 1010.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids
otherfindaid.p: For other Rockefeller family photographic holdings, please see the following finding aids:

FA453 David Rockefeller family photographs, Series 1010

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC. Researchers interested in accessing digital media (floppy disks, CDs, DVDs, etc.) or audiovisual material (audio cassettes, VHS, etc.) in this collection must use an access surrogate. The original items may not be accessed because of preservation concerns. To request an access surrogate be made, or if you are unsure if there is an access surrogate, please contact an archivist.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller. Sr. family photographs

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: 1003A Bessie Rockefeller Strong. 1003B Alta Rockefeller Prentice family. 1003C Edith Rockefeller McCormick family. 1003D Edith Rockefeller McCormick family - Mathilde McCormick Oser.
For ease of access, the material is further arranged by:
Prints (Boxes P 1, P 2, P 3, etc.). Albums (Boxes A 1, A 2, A 3, etc.). Oversized (Boxes: O 1, O 2, O 3, C 1, C 2, C 3, etc.).
